actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution recognizing and commending the 2011 National Veterans Wheelchair Games, to be held in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania August 1, through August 6, 2011.
subjects: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

summary.text: Recognizes the significant contribution that the National Veterans Wheelchair Games make to the lives of disabled veterans who selflessly served the United States. Commends the organizers and volunteers of and the participants in the 2011 National Veterans Wheelchair Games for their efforts in the service of the United States.

titles.title: A resolution recognizing and commending the 2011 National Veterans Wheelchair Games, to be held in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania August 1, through August 6, 2011.
